alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 3:47PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SHASTA COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM PST... At 345 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms extending from 10 miles west of Round Mountain to Redding to Centerville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Redding, Palo Cedro, Shasta Lake, and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
